titlePart.entryReference: shoe making machines incorporating printing or embossing apparatus , e.g. ,
methods of printing not dependent on the use of special machines

titlePart.text: Platen presses, i.e. presses in which printing is effected by at least one essentially-flat pressure-applying member co-operating with a flat type-bed
for mono-impression printing, e.g. on sheets
with platen maintained parallel to bed during movement
for multi-impression printing in one or more colours, e.g. on webs
using swinging platens, or forme supports
for perfecting sheets, i.e. for printing on both sides of sheets
specially adapted for printing heads, e.g. letter heads
Clamps for conveying sheets and for holding same on the platens
using flat inking elements, e.g. discs
pivoting around the platen or base
supported on carriages for movement in or on runways
Arrangements of counting devices for counting sheets
to the hands of the operator
Cylinder presses, i.e. presses essentially comprising at least one cylinder co-operating with at least one flat type-bed
with impression cylinder or cylinders rotating unidirectionally
Twin presses, i.e. with more than one cylinder or type-bed
with impression cylinder or cylinders rotating in opposite directions during each working cycle
Twin presses, i.e. with more than one cylinder or type-bed
of special construction or for particular purposes
with fixed type-beds and travelling impression cylinders
with cylinders travelling around type-beds having upper and lower printing surfaces
with type-beds and impression cylinders simultaneously movable relative to one another
Proof-print presses for relief printing, lithography or intaglio printing, i.e. presses for checking accuracy of printing surfaces
for perfecting sheets, i.e. for printing on both sides thereof
for monocolour or multicolour printing on one side of webs, or for perfecting webs, i.e. monocolour or multicolour printing on both sides of webs
Apparatus for cooling, heating, or drying printing surfaces
Devices for adjusting cylinders relative to type-beds and setting in adjusted position
Applications of linkwork or gearing for producing reciprocatory or angular motion
Applications of braking devices or of devices for stopping type-bed in registered position
with several printing units in sequential arrangement
with several printing units in both superimposed and sequential arrangement
with several printing units arranged side by side
for printing on one side and on the other side of webs between the same forme and impression cylinders
with several impression cylinders arranged around a forme cylinder
using one impression cylinder co-operating with several forme cylinders
using printing units incorporating one forme cylinder, one transfer cylinder, and one impression cylinder, e.g. for printing on webs
using one transfer cylinder co-operating with several forme cylinders for printing on sheets or webs
using one impression cylinder co-operating with several transfer cylinders for printing on sheets or webs
using two cylinders one of which serves two functions, e.g. as a transfer and impression cylinder
with two or more impression cylinders coacting with a single forme cylinder
for printing on non-deformable material, e.g. sheet metal
Clamps for attaching blankets to transfer or offset cylinders
Ducts, containers, or like supply devices for liquids
Inking rollers serving also to apply ink repellent
Devices for tripping or lifting damping rollers
Supporting, adjusting, or removing arrangements therefor
Continuous flexible surfaces, e.g. endless bands
Removing or recovering ink from wiping mechanisms
Auxiliary devices for exchanging forme cylinders
Rotary presses or machines having forme cylinders carrying a plurality of printing surfaces, or for performing letterpress, lithographic, and intaglio processes selectively or in combination
Common details of rotary presses or machines
Conveying or guiding webs through presses or machines
titlePart.entryReference: feeding webs to or from presses or machines

titlePart.text: with means for displacing the cylinders
with means for displacing the printing formes on the cylinders
Bearings or supports for forme, offset, or impression cylinders
Means for cooling or heating forme or impression cylinders
Arrangements or dispositions of cylinder bearings, forks, or supports
Cams, eccentrics, wedges, or the like
Guards or covers, e.g. for preventing ingress or egress of foreign matter
Arrangements to accommodate interchangeable cylinders of different sizes to enable machine to print on areas of different sizes
Printing units for inserting latest news
Arrangements to enable printing to be effected over selected areas of a single forme cylinder
by effecting relative movement of forme and impression cylinders during printing cycle
by projecting and retracting parts of the surface of the forme cylinder
Auxiliary folding, cutting, collecting, or depositing of sheets or webs

titlePart.entryReference: gathering sheets or signatures in bookbinding

titlePart.text: with auxiliary equipment, e.g. for drying printed articles
with auxiliary equipment, e.g. for drying printed articles
for elongated flat articles, e.g. strips, bands

titlePart.entryReference: doctors of rotary intaglio printing presses

titlePart.text: with two or more operative parts
Printing apparatus or machines of special types or for particular purposes, not otherwise provided for
titlePart.entryReference: hand stamps, plier-like tools for printing or punching tickets or the like
addressing machines or other office printing equipment
coding or marking of packaging material or of completed packages in packaging machines

titlePart.text: for printing books or manifolding sets
for printing on rolls of material, the roll serving as impression cylinder, e.g. strip printers
for printing on filamentary or elongated articles, or on articles with cylindrical surfaces
on articles of indefinite length, e.g. wires, hoses, tubes, yarns
on end or bottom surfaces thereof
on curved surfaces of articles of varying cross-section, e.g. bottles, lamp glasses
on articles of uniform cross-section, e.g. pencils, rulers, resistors
for printing on flat surfaces of polyhedral articles
for printing on curved surfaces of conical or frusto-conical articles
for printing on curved surfaces of essentially spherical, or part-spherical, articles
on articles with surface irregularities, e.g. fruit, nuts
for printing on tablets, pills, or like small articles
Apparatus or machines for carrying out printing operations combined with other operations
titlePart.entryReference: auxiliary perforating apparatus associated with printing devices
coding or marking in association with packaging
printing with a printer's forme combined with embossing

titlePart.text: using intaglio printing formes and wipers
Printing and embossing between a negative and a positive forme after inking and wiping the negative forme
Printing from an ink band treated with colour or "gold"
Devices for conveying sheets through printing apparatus or machines
titlePart.entryReference: feeding sheets to or from printing apparatus or machines

titlePart.text: Combinations of endless conveyers and grippers
Combinations of transfer drums and grippers
Adjusting leading edges, e.g. front stops
Adjusting lateral edges, e.g. side stops
Devices for treating the surfaces of sheets, webs, or other articles in connection with printing
titlePart.entryReference: as a final step in the manufacture of such articles, see appropriate sub-classes, e.g. , ,

titlePart.text: by heat drying, by cooling, by applying powders
Powdering devices, e.g. for preventing set-off
Print-finishing devices, e.g. for glossing prints
Devices for pressing sheets or webs against cylinders, e.g. for smoothing purposes
titlePart.entryReference: apparatus for taking-out curl from webs in general

titlePart.text: Devices for attaching printing elements or formes to supports
for attaching printing elements to flat type-beds
for attaching printing elements to forme cylinders
for attaching printing formes to flat type-beds
for attaching non-deformable curved printing formes to forme cylinders
for attaching printing formes to intermediate supports, e.g. adapter members
Overlays or other make-ready arrangements or devices
Impression or offset surfaces, e.g. blankets

titlePart.entryReference: applying liquids or other fluent materials to surfaces, in general
for typewriters or selective printing mechanisms

titlePart.text: Ducts, containers, supply devices or ink-level control devices
Troughs or like reservoirs with immersed, or partly immersed, rollers or cylinders
with ink-ejecting means, e.g. pumps, nozzles
Applications of feed or duct rollers
Applications of messenger or other moving transfer rollers
for inking selected parts of printing formes
for inking from interior of cylinder
Arrangements for tripping, lifting, adjusting, or removing inking rollers, Supports, bearings, or forks therefor
Cam, eccentric, wedge, or like devices
Indicating, counting, warning, control, or safety devices
titlePart.entryReference: such devices in general, see the relevant sub-classes, e.g. counting in general

titlePart.text: Arrangements of indicating devices, e.g. counters
titlePart.entryReference: arrangements of counting devices in platen presses , e.g. , in cylinder presses , in typewriters or selective printing mechanisms
cylinder-tripping devices of rotary presses or machines

titlePart.text: for starting or stopping operation of sheet or web feed
for starting or stopping operation of cylinders
for starting or stopping operation of damping or inking units
for starting or stopping the machine as a whole
Automatic control of tripping devices by feelers, photoelectric devices, pneumatic devices, or other detectors
Programming systems for automatic control of sequence of operations
